text: Johannes Josephus Maria “Jean” Penders (5 April 1939 – 13 January 2025) was a Dutch politician. He was a member of the Catholic People's Party and from 1980 of Christian Democratic Appeal. He served as a member for the European Parliament between 1979 and 1994. Penders died in Leidschendam on 13 January 2025, at the age of 85. ==References== Category:Dutch politicians Category:1939 births Category:2025 deaths Category:MEPs for the Netherlands
title: Jean Penders
